scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Bottom half of p. 7 is missing, Belle draft is on p. 1-7, 11-20, 53-59, 61-272. Page 7A-8, notes about libraries, p. 21-52 personal family history unrelated to Belle. Rough correspondence to Chapter XXVII of Belle, starting around p. 97. Page 194 dated October 8, 1982.
